Welcome to my blog site

What This Is All About...

When first thinking about my blog site I wanted to write about my journey self teaching myself coding, web development, programming etc. But, after some thinking I decided a different route. This blog will be about those asspects absolutely but also keep to my roots.

If you hop over and check out the about me page I write about my time as a personal trainer and my passion for health and wellness. My blog will include my journey of keeping healthy while learning programming and coding. Who knows you may even find a few helpful tips and tricks for yourself.

Thank you for visiting my site and I hope you enjoy it!
